channel.title: Early Adopters on Alfred kam
channel.description: Recent content in Early Adopters on Alfred kam

item.title: Importance of Early Adopters
item.description: When your startup is in the early stage, early adopters are your up most important customers. Let them use if for free of charge because they will become your key opinion leaders, they will be the ones who will help you break, change and polish your product. Remember to always respect them, understand why they like or dont like about it and have a fast iteration release to show dedication to serve them well.
